Mafia is e2's usergroup for playing games of [Mafia], in which "townies" attempt to lynch the "mafia" members and the "mafia" tries to kill all the "townies". All decisions are made by voting, and only the outnumbered mafia knows who is on what side.

[http://www.mafiascum.net/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page|Rules Here]

[http://www.sitesled.com/members/mikeburnfire/mafiascum04.swf|Flash Introduction to the game]

Protip: You can send private messages to groups of people with the following chatterbox command:
/msg{USER_1 USER_2} This is my group message
Note that there is no space before the first curly brace and the usernames are separated by spaces, with underscores for spaces in the usernames. It is recommended to include a note that this message was sent to the group in question to prevent confusion since there is no feedback for this.
Example: /msg{rootbeer277 Simulacron3 Spifficus_Rex} Mafia message: I think Aerobe is the cop. Let's kill her tonight.
